name: Crowd Control (Echonox)
description:
Shapeshifting aliens have invaded, and you cannot differentiate between humans and aliens by appearance! Fortunately, there is a sensor that indicates whether or not the person is a human or an alien. Press or hold down [space] in order to activate a laser that will eliminate anything it hits. Kill everybody marked as an alien before they escape, but make sure you don't kill a human by mistake!

Credits:

Development and Art by Echonox

Music by csx42

Follow csx42 for his AWESOME music!:
